mapper.select: SELECT p.point_id, p.point_score, p.point_item_name, p.point_item_content, p.category, p.created_at, i.image_id, i.image_url, i.image_type, i.alt_text FROM point p LEFT JOIN point_image i ON p.point_id = i.point_id WHERE p.point_id = #{pointId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point (point_score, point_item_name, point_item_content, category, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{pointScore}, #{pointItemName}, #{pointItemContent}, #{category}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE point SET point_score = #{pointScore}, point_item_name = #{pointItemName}, point_item_content = #{pointItemContent}, category = #{category}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE point_id = #{pointId}
